parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF:11240014), which is typically associated with electoral propaganda in Romania.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Dan Cosma, a Senator candidate for AUR (Alianța pentru Unirea Românilor) in Bistrița-Năsăud, clearly identifying him as a candidate participating in the parliamentary elections. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is designed to reach a wide audience, not just a select few.  The use of phrases like "Dragi români" (Dear Romanians) further reinforces this.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support Dan Cosma and the AUR party in the parliamentary elections. Phrases such as "Nu pot ei fura cât putem noi vota!" (They can't steal as much as we can vote!), "La parlamentare, votați AUR" (In the parliamentary elections, vote AUR), and the prominent display of AUR's logo and Dan Cosma's candidacy strongly suggest an intention to influence the vote. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not adhere to journalistic standards. It lacks objectivity and presents a biased perspective aimed at promoting a specific candidate and party.  It's not presenting news or analysis, but rather advocating for a particular outcome in the election.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>While the post expresses a viewpoint, it's not a personal opinion in the sense of a casual expression. It's a carefully crafted message designed for electoral campaigning, aiming to sway public opinion towards a specific candidate and party.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>472663805845598</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to a candidate (Dan Cosma), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the exact end date is not specified, the post's date suggests it's within the campaign period), has a clear electoral objective (influencing votes for AUR), and goes beyond simple journalistic reporting. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's language is explicitly designed to mobilize voters for AUR.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>DAN COSMA</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>AUR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Dan Cosma], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea pe Facebook, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări (ID 472663805845598) cu conținut electoral, care îndeplinește toate criteriile propagandei electorale conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, având ca scop influențarea votului în favoarea candidatului Dan Cosma și a partidului AUR, prin fraze precum „Nu pot ei fura cât putem noi vota!”, „La parlamentare, votați AUR”, și prezentarea vizibilă a logo-ului AUR și a candidaturii lui Dan Cosma.  Prezența numărului CMF:11240014 confirmă natura electorală a postării.  Efectul electoral este clar, vizând mobilizarea electoratului pentru AUR.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
